note.p: Scottish schoolteacher and philanthropist. Lived in Edinburgh. Daughter of Robert Fleming Gourlay (1778–1863; DCB) and his first wife Jean Stewart or Stuart née Henderson (1776–1820) of Kinghorn, Fife; baptised as Jean. Friend of Frances Julia Wedgwood. Tutor to the Paterson children at Linlathen, Forfarshire, the estate of Thomas Erskine of Linlathen (1788–1870; ODNB), theologian. Member of St John’s Episcopal Church, Princes Street, Edinburgh. Died in Umtata, Cape of Good Hope, on a missionary visit to Henry Callaway (ODNB), bishop of St John’s, Cape Colony.
